name: Ryan Lewis
mes:

He kept a vice grip on the fucker's shirt, knuckles white as he glared at the groaning fool. "What the fuck makes you think you have any right to even look at my sister, let alone hit on her, huh?"

*I swear to god, if this piece of shit doesn't back the fuck off, I'll break more than just his jaw. I'll fucking kill him if I have to.* He thought darkly, ready to throw more punches if needed.
